Der Anfang kann etwas schwer sein. Durch zB Skillchecks bei denen ich am Anfang häufiger sehe dass die Leute diese nicht treffen, das kommt allerdings mit der Zeit. Manchmal kann es etwas frustrierend sein wenn ein Killer die Survivor campt oder tunnelt, aber wenn man erst etwas besser ist trifft man dem entsprechend auch auf Leute die nicht campen. Am Anfang empfehle ich Feng oder Meg zu Leveln und danach dann David oder Bill.

fixed the matchmaking but always match with camping killer and tunnelling killer. hey dev. when can you guys make the game back to where we can try to survive and not stare at killer camping us?  all i can see is camping killer raising rank while pitiful survivor get camped to drop rank.

When you buy a game, it's because you want to have fun by taking a break away from the sress of work or school, but playing THIS specific game feels more like a frustrating chore than enjoyable with it's horrible game-play balancing, laughably out-of-touch developers and an insufferable majority of the player-base ruining the whole experience for everyone else, though i always find myself coming back to it, despite how i so desperately want to quit.

As someone who has played both survivor and killer pretty equally, around 700+ hours each, i can safely say that this game has some serious issues, here's a few examples:

Let's start with a game-changer: Perks can completely the way a match is played, each player can bring up to 4 perks max, from both survivor and killer very few of these perks are actually well-balanced, most of them fall into either "Meta" or "Meme" perks, meta perks being ones that literally everyone uses because not doing so would put you at a huge disadvantage over your opposition who is (95% of the time) also using a full set of meta perks, a great example being "Unbreakable" which allows you to recover faster and fully recover from dying on the ground once per match, this perk can turn a round where no survivors escape and all die to literally everyone escaping with no deaths at all, meme perks on the other hand are so useless that they can even be detrimental to both you and your team, a great example being no-mither which does pretty much the exact same thing as unbreakable but worse and with a few other negligible benefits BUT it has a downside where you stay injured and cannot be healed the ENTIRE match.

Killer powers are very similar to perks, balance wise, but are tied to each specific killer with a "Meta" killer for example being the Nurse who can literally teleport through walls and objects at will, going against a nurse who has mastered their power is literally impossible to beat, a "meme" killer like Clown is so bad in chases that it's kinda pathetic, he throws bottles of alcohol that break on impact and spreads a mist around a small area that slows survivors and distorts vision slightly to those who walk in it for a short time, this sounds good in theory but in practice survivors can easily continue running around a safe area with a pallet to drop on them, use meta perks to counter it, or just sneak away from the area affected totally unharmed.

The developers themselves are seen as a complete joke by pretty much everyone, they hardly listen to any from of feedback that isn't "this game is great! here's some fan-art." (unless it's in such a large quantity that they can't just ignore it, see update 4.5.0 for example),  they all seem to have the "quantity over quality" mindset as is evident by the mountain of DLC released while there are still bugs in the game discovered years ago, their monetisation is a complete mess with plentiful cosmetics, previously mentioned mountain of DLC, a damn battle-pass all with the base game itself still costing money, they also treat their community like rowdy children using sentences like "if you behave" or "if you're all nice then x".

Speaking of community, 90% of it is plagued by the most toxic barrel of radioactive waste i have ever had the misfortune of laying eyes upon, expect them to either disconnect or throw the game for everyone else if it's not going their way, also expect a TON of toxicity, insult's and racial slurs in the end-game chat and on your steam profile comments, no matter what or how well you did in-game.
The remaining 10% are the polar opposite, supporting you, being nice, and giving constructive feedback on things you did in-game, it's always a nice thing to see after the twenty or-so games of nothing but "too ez, baby killer, noob survivor, git gud xdd, *some racial slur/insult i can't post on a steam review*".

The in-game-ranking is also incredibly flawed with the "cool and new mmr ranking system" they've recently implemented, which has to be the actual worst matchmaking i have ever seen in any videogame, period.
You did well in one match? well then all your matches afterwards are ALWAYS going to be total sweat-fests from both sides because this new matchmaking system has taken any form of casual play out completely, it's either you use the meta religiously or you have zero total enjoyment anymore.

Playing with and against friends though is a whole different story, hop into discord with 4 other friends and play a few "kill your friends" matches and i guarantee you'll enjoy it, screaming, shouting and laughing with a bunch of friends over even the slightest thing is some of the best memories that this game can offer, it's a total 180 from what i've been talking about before this.

NOTE: as of recently (30th October 2021) the game is now involved with NFT's and has been overrun with cheaters, especially at high mmr, i'd highly recommend steering clear of matchmaking right now as due to the horrendous anti-cheat dbd uses it's near unplayable in it's current state.
ANOTHER NOTE: as of right now (18th March 2022) The problems from the last note are STILL an issue, even with all these problems these devs are prioritising quantity over quality by completely ignoring these problems and just releasing more DLC and cosmetics.

Overall, this game has got to be the most frustrating gaming experience a person can ever have, the balance of the most integral parts of this game is so laughably bad that it's just sad, the best thing this game has going for it are the character lore and design, the base game-play concept and the banger of a soundtrack (props to the music team behind that btw, that sh*t slaps), though if you wanna buy the game solely to play with friends in a 3-5 player party then i'd say go for it, when both the game and it's DLC's are all on discount that is, otherwise please just put your money into a better game.

After almost 300 hours in this game, it has gotten to the point where I can no longer recommend it.  I really enjoyed most of my time in the game, but the combination of matchmaking "updates", game-breaking bugs, and general survivor power creep in recent months has made the game more frustrating than fun. 

Ever since the multiple matchmaking, MMR, crossplay etc. updates that have been introduced and rolled back countless times over the past few weeks, the matchmaking system has been a complete joke.  It is very common to be placed into a game versus players 5+ ranks higher than you on both the survivor and killer sides.  The fact that a rank 10 killer will derank against a group of rank 1 survivors multiple games in a row even though they could get 3 or 4 kills if paired against rank 10 survivors is frustrating and does not make the game feel fun or rewarding.  Obviously it is unreasonable to assume you are going to win all of your games, but at the current state of matchmaking it often feels like you don't even have a chance.

While matchmaking affects both sides, I definitely found the issues more pronounced on the killer side.  Survivors are just generally stronger gameplay wise than killer with their wide array of meta perks and survivor sided maps, and the fact that 2-4 survivors can coordinate perks, strategy, killer location etc, through discord with absolutely zero way for the killer to counter makes the game feel very one sided.  Combine this with my opinion that gen speeds are too fast for the current meta, it's pretty easy for a team of coordinated survivors to complete 2 out of the 5 gens before the killer even sees one of them.  This would not be as much of an issue if it was confined to the higher ranks, as you need to expect harder games as you climb the ladder, but this terrible matchmaking has these rank 1 teams playing against rank 12 killers constantly.  Nothing is worse than waiting 10 mins to be put into a match against a 4 man SWF team 6 ranks higher than you, only to derank at the end of the game and start the whole process over again.

And this is ignoring all the other problems like toxicity (camping, teabagging, getting told to kill yourself if you run meta killer perks like NOED), game-breaking bugs (latency issues, invisible pallets on both sides, gens that don't make any noise on the killer side) and the fact that it takes years for the devs to fix unviable killers (Bubba only recently got fixed, Clown has been horrible for over a year, every patch seems to nerf the already horrible Pig and Legion).  

I hope that these issues can get ironed out because I really enjoy the theme, atmosphere, and generally gameplay of DBD, but where the game is at now provides an experience that is infinitely more frustrating than fun.

Игра очень весёлая, как с друзьями, так и без. В ней не скучно, и каждый выбирает свою сторону: Убийцы и выжившие (кому как нравится.) Я обожаю играть за убийцу (мне в кайф.) Но вот, что правда плохо, так это оптимизация и баги, если бы разрабы правда потрудились над игрой, то она стала бы и правда ОЧЕНЬ хорошей, эта игра и в принципе очень классная, но лучше, если бы разрабы её пофиксили. Нет, игра правда классная!

Il est temps pour moi de mettre un première avis après 30h de jeu :) !
Ceci est un premier avis et je ne suis pas rendu haut niveau sur le jeu mais je ne regrette en rien mon achat de ce jeu !
Tout d'abord parlons de l'ambiance général du jeu, avec les OST, niveau bande sonore je le trouve vraiment bien et ça permet à nos premières heures de jeux d'être riche en frayeur, noté malgré tout que vous vous habituerez vite à l'ambiance. Le jeu vous fera sans doute moins peur même si malgré tout sur certaines parties, il se peut que le tueur vous fasse une crise cardiaque. Justement parlons-en du gameplay et du contenu proposé par le jeu, le jeu fonctionne avec des DLC, sans DLC le jeu vous proposera plusieurs personnages, les principaux, ensuite c'est à vous de décider si vous voulez un tueur ou un survivant spécifique, en effet, en tant que survivant ou tueur, ils ont tous une manière de jouer et même sans DLC le jeu vous propose quand même pas mal de contenu et l'entièreté des maps à explorés. L'univers du jeu s'accorde très bien avec le jeu en général et j'aime beaucoup l'histoire des personnages que ça soit pour les tueurs ou les survivants ! N'hésitez pas à faire F1 dans le choix des personnages, ça en vaut la chandelle :) ! Graphiquement, le jeu est très beau et même si votre jeu est en moyen il le restera :) ! Malgré tout depuis la dernière maj, je trouve que le jeu lag un peu plus notamment quand on arrive à s'enfuir pour arriver sur la page des scores... 

Ce jeu pour son prix trouvable par exemple sur Instant Gaming (moins chère) ou même Steam vaut le coup même si il faut malgré tout aimer le jeu et l'aspect horreur ! Désolé pour les fautes orthographes possibles et j'espère que cet avis décrit au mieux le jeu tel qu'il est aujourd'hui :) !

Нормально, можно побегать как одному (но ливеры бесят), так и с друзьями. Привыкания не вызывает, много вариаций билдов и разнообразные маньяки, но лучше бы они уже сделали вторую часть игры, а не доили дополнениями эту.

The games just really good. I get to play my favorite horror movie characters and hunt people down or I can get 3 of my buddies and try to not get killed by those same characters. I don't play solo Sur. because i'm no thank you, 

now that crossplay as been added the queues are way faster so if you left because of queue times then that's sorta fixed and you can come back now.

now for the bad thing about crossplay console survivors where raised in a different meta and killer envirnment and honestly compared to pc survivors are really bad they rage quit after second hooks they are way to brave i suppose they are used to killers being impaired by the limitations of a controller and try really dumb stuff that ends up getting their team killed and when this happens they just leave.

So there is some good some bad but if you think you might even have the slightest want to play the game id say buy the base game play a few games on each side and if you didn't like it hey it's only 20 bucks

Gram w DBD od dawna. Ostatnio bardziej dorywczo, ale chyba jest jedyną grą, której od początku nigdy nie odinstalowałem. Nowym graczom mogę powiedzieć tylko tyle, żeby się nie poddawali kiedy spotkają toksycznych killerów albo egoistycznych, nierozgarniętych survivorów. Każdy jakoś zaczynał. Jeśli podejdziesz do gry z przymrużeniem oka i poświęcisz czas na rozwój swoich umiejętności, wtedy jeden udany mecz będzie wart więcej niż 5 porażek. Ogólnie nie żałuję czasu spędzonego na grze w DBD i planuję jeszcze długo w nią pykać. Polecam jak najbardziej.
Одни смурфы и ранговая система полное говно. Чел пытается научиться играть за Аню и в итоге не может разобраться в понимании игры.
good game, surprisingly exhilarating while playing as both the survivor and the killer. {8.2/10}

2133 saat olmuş bu oyunu oynayalı baştan bu yana bir değişiklik yok. Yapımcılar sadece para kazanma derdinde olup sürekli kozmetik üretmekle meşgul olup dandik bir oyun tasarlama programına oyunu ucuza okutma peşinde koşmaya devam ediyorlar. Katillerin neredeyse hepsi 0 IQ, sadece camp ve tünel yapıyorlar. Bunlara ilave olarak oyunun bir türlü bitmeyen bug sorunlarıda eklenince gerçekten kanser bir oyun. Oyunu oynayan arkadaşlarınız yoksa satın almayın gidin Civilization oynayın, tam da DBD yapımcısının önerdiği gibi;)

Игра скатилась в унылое дерьмо. Токсичность сообщества зашкаливает. За 3 года как заводили генераторы - так все и осталось. Вводят новых убийц с абсолютно такими же механиками в глобале, как старые. Убийца-суммонер? Идите в жопу. Убийца - мимик? Пошли вы, сообщество! Зато каждую неделю новые костюмчики и баттл пасс постоянный.

I enjoy playing this game but hookcampers are a huge provblem and destroy the game. 
An option to fix it would be to have a chance to be able unhook  your mates on like 20m away if the killer is in a radius of 15m more than 45 seconds.

НУ ТАКОЕ
Игруля конечно достойна внимания, спору нет. Интересный, необычный (особенно был на момент выхода) гемплей.
Но если ты зашёл в игру первый раз, то хрен ты разберёшься чего тебе надо делать для победы за маньяка или выжившего. Обучение есть, но оно в стиле "Ну кароч вот тут нажал, туда посмотрел, там проверил и нормально будет", ну а ты такой "ок, ничего сложного". Но по факту от тебя требуются десятки часов, чтоб разобраться как всё работает и понимать, что делать помимо "Прибежа/убежал/ударил/спрятался/". Работа перков, подношений, улучшений даже по описанию до конца непонятны новому пользователю. Если ты думаешь, что ща за маньяка разнесёшь всем лица, а против тебя чуваки по 3К часов (а тебя к ним кинет и не раз! Т.к. система подбора практически отсутствует), то готовься к фразам "*бать, это как? Да чё за х**ня?! Да идите вы на йух, задроты". Ну и лично по моему мнению баланс в игре очень сильно хромает. Но игруля всё равно прикольная

このゲームではキラー不足とのことで、サバイバーをほとんど触らずにキラーでプレイし始めました。
まだ4日ほどですが、ゲーム内容は駆け引きが多くそこそこ楽しめています。
また、ゲーム用のグラボを積んでいないPCでも動いてくれるのがかなりありがたいですね。
始めやすさに関しては完全に一見様お断り状態ですが、2日も耐えれば楽しめるようになりますね。
